sections.heading: Our Grand Vision
sections.text: Step through our majestic entrance into a world where learning transcends classrooms and textbooks. Here, every child embarks on a journey of discovery that nurtures intellectual curiosity, moral integrity, and creative thinking, shaping minds that will lead tomorrow's world.

sections.heading: Meet the Faculty
sections.text: Welcome to meet our distinguished faculty — educators dedicated to innovation and excellence. Through regular workshops, collaborative sessions, and peer mentorship, our teachers embody the spirit of lifelong learning, ensuring every lesson inspires and transforms.

sections.heading: Principal's Message
sections.text: Education is not merely the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire within each soul. At Doon International School, we ignite curiosity, foster integrity, and cultivate global citizens who will shape tomorrow's world.
